mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_point (point_name, remarks_name, point_type, point_unit, block_no, state, init_date, init_user, mod_date, mod_user) VALUES (#{pointName}, #{remarksName}, #{pointType}, #{pointUnit}, #{blockNo}, #{state}, now(), #{initUser}, now(), #{modUser});
mapper.select: select * from ta_point where point_id in (${pointIds}) order by point_id asc
